info.title: QR Feedback SaaS API
info.description: Backend for QR Code Customer Feedback Platform

post.description: OAuth2 compatible token login, get an access token for future requests

schema.title: Response Login Access Token Api V1 Login Access Token Post
Response Login Endpoint Api V1 Auth Login Post

get.description: Get performance metrics for the current fleeter.
List tasks assigned to the current fleeter.

schema.title: Response List Tasks Api V1 Tasks  Get
Response Delete Task Api V1 Tasks  Id  Delete

get.description: List tenants assigned to the current fleeter.

schema.title: Response List Assigned Tenants Api V1 Fleeter Tenants  Get

post.description: Resend invitation to the tenant admin.

schema.title: Response Resend Invite Api V1 Fleeter Tenants  Tenant Id  Resend Invite Post

post.description: Escalate tenant issues to technical support.

schema.title: Response Escalate To Support Api V1 Fleeter Tenants  Tenant Id  Escalate Post

get.description: List onboarding pipeline items.

schema.title: Response List Onboarding Api V1 Onboarding  Get

get.description: Get onboarding details.
Retrieve forms for the current tenant.

schema.title: Response Read Forms Api V1 Forms  Get

get.description: Get a specific form by ID.

post.description:
Set a form as the default for the tenant.
Unsets any existing default.

get.description: Get statistics for a form with optional filters.

schema.title: Response Submit Feedback Api V1 Forms Public Feedback Post

get.description: Export feedback to CSV.
Get a specific form by slug (Public Access) with Tenant Branding.
Retrieve locations for the current tenant.

schema.title: Response Read Locations Api V1 Locations  Get

get.description: List available subscription plans.

schema.title: Response List Plans Api V1 Tenants Plans Get

post.description: Onboard new tenant: Create Tenant + Admin User + Handle Password & Email.

get.description: Get current user's tenant.

post.description: Upload tenant letterhead and trigger analysis.
Approve branding settings for the tenant with optional binary logo.

get.description: Get current user.

schema.title: Response Update Password Me Api V1 Users Me Password Post

get.description: Get platform-wide statistics for Super Admin dashboard.

schema.title: Response Get Admin Stats Api V1 Admin Overview Get

get.description: List tenants with optional search.

schema.title: Response List Tenants Api V1 Admin Tenants Get

post.description: Create a new tenant (Super Admin Manual Onboard).

get.description: List all platform users with optional role filter.

schema.title: Response List Users Api V1 Admin Users Get
Response Delete User Api V1 Admin Users  User Id  Delete
Response List Plans Api V1 Admin Plans Get
Response List Features Api V1 Admin Features Get
Response List Audit Logs Api V1 Admin Audit Logs Get
Response List Settings Api V1 Admin Settings Get

get.description: List leads with optional search and status filter.

schema.title: Response List Leads Api V1 Leads  Get

get.description: Get lead details by ID.

post.description:
Convert a lead to a tenant.
Creates a tenant and a tenant admin user.

schema.title: Response Convert Lead To Tenant Api V1 Leads  Id  Convert Post

post.description: Schedule a follow-up for a lead.

get.description: List all follow-ups (for the follow-ups dashboard).

schema.title: Response List All Follow Ups Api V1 Leads Follow Ups All Get
